name: python-twitter-guide
description: Code snippets and links to docs around using Twitter API and Tweepy
author: MichaelCurrin

scripts.cp-to-build: rm -rf build && cp -r .presite/\#/ build && cp var/{sitemap.xml,robots.txt} build
scripts.build: node processNav.js && presite docs --quiet && npm run cp-to-build && ./make_paths_static.sh
